titles.title: Providing for consideration of the Senate amendment to the House amendment to the Senate amendment to the bill (H.R. 4346) making appropriations for the Legislative Branch for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2022, and for other purposes, and providing for proceedings during the period from August 1, 2022, through September 12, 2022.

Providing for consideration of the Senate amendment to the House amendment to the Senate amendment to the bill (H.R. 4346) making appropriations for the Legislative Branch for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2022, and for other purposes, and providing for proceedings during the period from August 1, 2022, through September 12, 2022.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 117-445, by Mr. Morelle.

Rule provides for consideration of the Senate amendment to the House amendment to the Senate amendment to H.R. 4346. The motion shall be debatable for one hour, the previous question shall be ordered on the motion without intervening motion. The rule also provides for proceedings during the period from August 1, 2022 through September 12, 2022.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 91.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 1289.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 218 - 208 (Roll no. 402).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 216 - 208 (Roll no. 403).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: This resolution sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 4346.
